Brief Description: Provide an opportunity for people to come by and chat, check out SPECTRUM's resources, and borrow movies and books. Our drop-in hours are listed at our website.

A mailing list of local events for the rainbow communities of Waterloo-Wellington

CompanyOrgName: Community Justice Initiatives of Waterloo Region (CJI)
Brief Description: Provides services in conflict resolution, group support for persons impacted by sexual trauma, and reintegration support for women returning to the community from prison.
